ana šarri bēlīya aradka Bel-ibni Nabu u Marduk ana šarri bēlīya likrubū ultu x x x x x x x x idkûma x x x x x x x x ana tarṣi x x x x x x x x niddû x x x x x x x x illakamma x x x x x x x x u mimma x x x x x x x x Marduk-apla-iddina x x x x x ana šupti x x x x x x x x kî libbi x x x x x x x x siksistī x x x x x x x x u {1}{d}x x x x x x x x abnu ana x x x x x x x x x x išemmû gabrî šipirti x x+x Marduk-apla-iddina kî nipṭur x x niltapraššu
